channel.title: Paradox ~ An RSPS Revolution [wont regret trying]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://paradoxrsps.com/portal/images/logo.png[/img]
[b]Forums:[/b] http://paradoxrsps.com/
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dfyaLHST-PM
Content We have lots to do at Paradox, from hunting implings, to agility, to slaying intense and challenging bosses. We aren't just your casual server, we strive make sure content is new, unique and challenging
[img]http://s23.postimg.org/kj44qf78r/dclaws.png[/img]
[img]http://s21.postimg.org/5j233zn87/image.png[/img]
[img]http://s16.postimg.org/p04uuxnxh/111.png[/img]
[img]http://s8.postimg.org/7ikurp4qd/222.png[/img]
[img]http://s23.postimg.org/3u87azxwr/333.png[/img]
[img]http://s13.postimg.org/hexxes37b/444.png[/img]
[b]Goals & Gameplay[/b] Here at Paradox we strive to pamper all player's goals alike. PvM, PvP, and Skiller, we will make sure to have content equality through all three of those game personas, we strive for an equal, fun, and fluid gameplay for all players alike.
[b]Community Driven[/b] Here at Paradox we take the community very seriously. The server is community driven and built around your needs, this isn't our server, it's yours! We want you to have an enjoyable server and have a good feedback from all players.
Some Features Perfected Combat Formulas Perfected Dragon claws Intense PvP Dwarf Cannon Barbarian Assault Block larger amounts of damage with better bonuses 22 Skills to master and tackle Realistic economy and drops Full Brimhaven dungeon to explore Full Slayer cave to explore Skeletal Wyverns Many drops for all npcs Staff of Light Revised Magic System Unique to an server A whole Island dedicated to skilling A thieving layer with advanced proficiency Beautiful donator zone and benefits Advanced Farming skill[/center]

item.title: Paradox ~ An RSPS Revolution [wont regret trying]
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

[center]

Forums: http://paradoxrsps.com/

Content
We have lots to do at Paradox, from hunting implings, to agility, to slaying intense and challenging bosses. We aren’t just your casual server, we strive make sure content is new, unique and challenging

Goals & Gameplay
Here at Paradox we strive to pamper all player’s goals alike. PvM, PvP, and Skiller, we will make sure to have content equality through all three of those game personas, we strive for an equal, fun, and fluid gameplay for all players alike.

Community Driven
Here at Paradox we take the community very seriously. The server is community driven and built around your needs, this isn’t our server, it’s yours! We want you to have an enjoyable server and have a good feedback from all players.

Some Features
Perfected Combat Formulas
Perfected Dragon claws
Intense PvP
Dwarf Cannon
Barbarian Assault
Block larger amounts of damage with better bonuses
22 Skills to master and tackle
Realistic economy and drops
Full Brimhaven dungeon to explore
Full Slayer cave to explore
Skeletal Wyverns
Many drops for all npcs
Staff of Light
Revised Magic System Unique to an server
A whole Island dedicated to skilling
A thieving layer with advanced proficiency
Beautiful donator zone and benefits
Advanced Farming skill[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Paradox ~ An RSPS Revolution [wont regret trying]
